amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for U.S. Customs and Border Protection preclearance operations at Abu Dhabi International Airport in the United Arab Emirates. The limitation described in this section shall not apply in the case of the administration of a tax or tariff.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for U.S. Customs and Border Protection preclearance operations at Abu Dhabi International Airport in the United Arab Emirates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meehan amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meehan amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Meehan.
